channel.title: Why Does everyone Hate Deltascape?
channel.description:
Basicly everyone hates deltascape.. 85% of use probably use Delta as your base client.. Most server bases were made from Deltascape source.. most people edit the source and say they don't use Deltascape.. pretty sad..
I got to say i do like deltascape.

item.title: Why Does everyone Hate Deltascape?
item.dc:creator: @Souls2 Souls`
item.description:
@Souls2 wrote:

Err… If you could remove all the bugs from it and fix everything i think it would be the most popular source…

Read full topic

item.title: Why Does everyone Hate Deltascape?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

relmitos:

I dont hate Delta, I just think that its outdated.

Almost all 317 servers are outdated. Well I should say all 317 are outdated due to the fact that rs is at 600+ now.

Read full topic

item.title: Why Does everyone Hate Deltascape?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

In my opinion, the reason most people use Delta, is because it is a, what I call, a “plug-n-play” server. Its already got most thing a RSPS should have, minigame, quests, and a decent economy, and a way to make money. It does have alot of glitches like jmood said, but they can be fixed.

Read full topic

item.title: Why Does everyone Hate Deltascape?
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:7, topic:336338”][quote author=Javafire link=topic=432712.msg3176685#msg3176685 date=1270927516]

Basicly everyone hates deltascape… 85% of use probably use Delta as your base client… Most server bases were made from Deltascape source… most people edit the source and say they don’t use Deltascape… pretty sad…

I got to say i do like deltascape.
[/quote] Most servers were made from 317 cache extracts from runescape, after that 508 took over anyways, deltacape is one of about 70 different (even close to stable) sources you can use.

508s haven’t taken over. Most people don’t like delta scape because, 1 its used by almost everyone on the SS page, 2 a lot of glitches, bugs, and ways to take it down, 3 its used way to much, 4 people can profit off it very easily. I don’t like delta because it is used way to much, but it is still a decent source to use, unless your looking for something like a custom framework to build a server on.[/quote]
that too…

Read full topic

item.title: Why Does everyone Hate Deltascape?

item.description:

Basicly everyone hates deltascape… 85% of use probably use Delta as your base client… Most server bases were made from Deltascape source… most people edit the source and say they don’t use Deltascape… pretty sad…

I got to say i do like deltascape.
[/quote] Most servers were made from 317 cache extracts from runescape, after that 508 took over anyways, deltacape is one of about 70 different (even close to stable) sources you can use.[/quote]

508s haven’t taken over. Most people don’t like delta scape because, 1 its used by almost everyone on the SS page, 2 a lot of glitches, bugs, and ways to take it down, 3 its used way to much, 4 people can profit off it very easily. I don’t like delta because it is used way to much, but it is still a decent source to use, unless your looking for something like a custom framework to build a server on.

Because Deltascape is over used and has lots of bugs/glitches.
